title: Azure Event Hub Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
text: This section describes the Azure Event Hub consumer (collector) and producer (forwarding) agents. These agents are available in real-time workflow configurations. The section contains the following subsections: Azure Profile Azure Event Hub Consumer Agent Azure Event Hub Producer Agent
